texto texto texto texto texto

using TDAmapper

X = Datasets.circle(1000)
fv = excentricity(X)
fv = X[:, 1]
cv = uniform(fv)

mp = mapper(X, fv, cv);
mp

Mapper graph of X

title: Sampling data
text:
An ϵ-net is a subset of a point cloud X such that \[
\forall x \in X, \exists y \in Y | d(x, y) <= \epsilon
\]
that is: every point \(x\) of \(X\) is in an ϵ-neighborhood of some point of \(Y\).



using TDAmapper
using Plots

X = rand(2, 10^4)
ϵ = 0.1
ids = epsilon_net(X, ϵ)
Y = X[:, ids]
scatter(X[1, :], X[2, :])
scatter!(Y[1, :], Y[2, :], color = :red)

Searching neighborhood of point number 2     Time: 0:00:00Searching neighborhood of point number 72      Time: 0:00:00
